name: WePare
description:
Pare is a mental health company that’s being developed out of the London Antler programme. We’re looking to transform the mental health space by empowering human connection. Building a business that’s daring, innovative and technology driven. 

The company was founded by the Finance Director of a VC backed Medical Technology Startup, who was a Bain consultant with several years experience in data analytics, financial analysis and venture investing, and the Former Founder & MD of a digital agency in Germany that worked with the likes of Tommy Hilfiger, Rocket Internet, Opel and BMW.

The team includes a Clinical Neuropsychologist specialised in neuropsychological assessment, a PhD in psycholinguistics, artificial neural networks, syntax, reading span and an interim CTO with over 10 years' experience developing technology and products for startups.

team.name: Stephanie Demetriou
team.bioHtml: Founder. FD of VC backed MedTech startup. Data analytics, financial analysis and venture investing (Bain, Angel investors), UCT and UC Berkeley.

team.title: Founder
team.name: Stephanie Demetriou
team.bioHtml: Founder. FD of VC backed MedTech startup. Data analytics, financial analysis and venture investing (Bain, Angel investors), UCT and UC Berkeley.

jobs.title: Full Stack Software Developer
jobs.description:
Pare is a mental health company that’s being developed out of the London Antler programme. 

We’re looking to transform the mental health space by empowering human connection. Building a business that’s daring, innovative and technology driven. 

The company was founded by the Finance Director of a VC backed Medical Technology Startup, who was a Bain consultant with several years experience in data analytics, financial analysis and venture investing, and the Former Founder & MD of a digital agency in Germany that worked with the likes of Tommy Hilfiger, Rocket Internet, Opel and BMW.

The team includes a Clinical Neuropsychologist specialised in neuropsychological assessment, a PhD in psycholinguistics, artificial neural networks, syntax, reading span and an interim CTO with over 10 years' experience developing technology and products for startups.

**Who we’re looking for**:

A dynamic, experienced full stack developer. As one of our first engineers, you will have enormous influence over our engineering culture, our technology stack and our product’s look and feel. 

We are looking for individuals that showcase willingness to learn and can grow with the business. You'll define our product roadmap and develop our MVP from scratch, making architectural decisions that will define our engineering culture, while collaborating with our commercial team to make sure user experience is fun and engaging. 

**The Role:**

* Leading full stack developer reporting to interim CTO and founders
* Utilise a variety of front and backend technologies to build a scalable MVP
* You'll have the opportunity to define our engineering culture and technical stack since the beginning
* Establish the technical requirements and development execution of our product

**Your skills include:**
(We don’t expect you to meet all of the below but would love you to have experience in some of these areas.)

* Pride in readable, well-designed, well-tested software
* Experience with TDD environments (RSpec, Minitest, Capybara, Selenium)
* Experience with relational databases (PostGreSQL, MySQL) and key-value stores (Memcache, Redis)
* Experience with front-end web technology, bonus points for React
* Experience with web architecture at scale
* Experience with "NoSQL" data backends (Redis, MongoDB, ElasticSearch)
* Experience solving integration problems with software

**Requirements:**
* 3 or more years professional experience writing web-based applications in any language, (Preferably Ruby/Rails, Go, Python or Scala)
* Experience in system and data analysis, architecture, and design
* Experience with data integration and workflow design
* Experience working in a cross-functional team
* Experience working on an iOS or Android app at scale
* Experience working with Git
* Experience writing testable and maintainable code

**More about the culture at Pare:**
* We are hard workers
* We strive for excellence
* We are rigorous in how we make decisions
* We are open and supportive
* We don’t give up
* We respect one another 
* We give feedback - constantly, negative and positive
* We celebrate successes and work together to combat failures

We are looking forward to hearing from you!

**Side note- Please DO NOT add us on linkedin we will not respond.**
